Locket Widget

Brief:

Locket Widget is a charming and intimate social app that revolutionizes the way you share moments with your innermost circle. Designing a personalized stream of picture updates straight to your home screen, Locket Widget keeps you connected with your nearest and dearest in a delightful and innovative way.
